full_summary:
Fuel Containment System Request for Proposal
==========================

**Notice Information**
-------------------

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3657236547
*   **Publication Date**: October 18, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: November 17, 2022, at 14:00:00 EST
*   **Amendment Number**: 2
*

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

This procurement is for the supply and delivery of several fuel containment systems and necessary accessories to provide secondary containment at a fuel cache in the Thaidene Nene Park (TDN). Each system must be capable of holding twelve 45-gallon fuel drums when laid flat. The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canada Free Trade Agreement.

**Technical Requirements**
-------------------------

A complete list of mandatory specifications is detailed in the Annex. The required delivery date is March 31, 2023.

**Provement Method**
-------------------

This procurement will be conducted using a competitive open bidding process.

**Selection Criteria**
---------------------

The selection will be based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This procurement is subject to the provisions of the Canada Free Trade Agreement.

**Notice Issuing Agency**
-------------------------

This request for proposal is issued by Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Parks Canada Agency.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   **Contact Name**: Ruwani Wall (Public Works and Government Services Canada)
*   **Contact Email**: <ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14396618?extsite=MTQzOTY2MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please disregard the original Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the specified tender closing date and time to be considered responsive.   [1](#_ftn1)

1.  [^1]: The original closing time specified was 2:00 PM EST.

You can expand on the original content only if absolutely necessary. Please don't spread it out across many lines unless the details are long descriptions.
